NAME: Windows Daily Snapshots now Available
BODY:
Travis Howell is making daily snapshots of ScummVM for Windows available for download. Kudos go out to Travis. Also, there is a link for a Windows GDI version of ScummVM. This version does not require SDL. If you are having problems getting the SDL version to work, give that one a try.
We have also placed a Compatibility Page online to help answer the most common question, "Which games work?". We will keep this page updated as development continues.
